basics.name: Marcelo's Resume
basics.label: Software Engineering Student
basics.summary: I'm in my last year of studies towards a bachelor's in software Engineering. I enjoy developing web/mobile based applications that provide a good user experience. I feel comfortable working in an agile environment, making use of scrum-like frameworks.

work.name: Bertoni Solutions
work.summary: Bertoni Solutions is a digital consulting company, with in-house software development, QA and testing capabilities.
highlights: Developed RESTlike APIs using .NET Core Technologies.
Helped design database schemas and crucial software architecture.
Handled CI/CD pipelines on Azure Pipelines in integration with Azure Devops and Azure Web Services.

work.name: Encora
work.summary: Encora is a leader in the large and rapidly growing outsourced product development market.
highlights: Administration of certain platforms related to the software delivery lifecycle, such as Octopus Deploy, Team Foundation Service, SonarQube, Proget, and Azure DevOps.
Worked on creating and maintaining CI/CD pipelines.
Developed web reporting web application to draw meaningful conclusions about our deployments.
Contributed on implementation of vulnerability scanning procedures
Maintained PowerShell scripts that integrate data between different company systems.
Worked on configuring and securing Azure resources through terraform.

awards.title: Scrum Foundations Professional Certificate (SFPC)
awards.summary: The Learning Objectives for this certification are based on: The 2020 Scrum Guide, The Agile Manifesto and the Agile Glossary.

awards.title: Python for Everybody Specialization
awards.summary: This Specialization builds on the success of the Python for Everybody course and will introduce fundamental programming concepts including data structures, networked application program interfaces, and databases, using the Python programming language.

awards.title: IBM Cybersecurity Analyst Specialization
awards.summary: Concepts including network security, endpoint protection, incident response, threat intelligence, penetration testing, and vulnerability assessment.

awards.title: Microsoft Certified Azure Fundamentals
awards.summary: Fundamental knowledge of cloud concepts, along with Azure services, workloads, security, privacy, pricing, and support.

awards.title: Regulatory Compliance Specialization
awards.summary: This specialization will introduce the essential elements of effective organizational compliance by exploring the concepts, considerations, and strategies for assessing risks and managing the compliance function.

references.name: Erlich Bachman
references.reference: It is my pleasure to recommend Richard, his performance working as a consultant for Main St. Company proved that he will be a valuable addition to any company.
